import React from 'react' import s from './support.module.scss' import $ from 'jquery' export default function Support({ tasks }) { const openTaskText = id => { $(`.show-${id}`).toggleClass('show'); } return (
CREATE NEW TASK
SEND
HISTORY
{tasks && tasks.length ? tasks.map((task, i) => { return
{task.theme}
{task.text}
openTaskText(task.id)}>{!showText ? 'READ MORE' : 'HIDE'}
}) :
No tasks...
}
) }
